name: sla-service
description: SLA Service - Full-stack application with NestJS API and NextJS frontend

scripts.devcontainer:setup: npm run install:all && npm run migration:run
scripts.install:all: npm run install:api && npm run install:web
scripts.test: cd nestjs-api && npm test && cd ../nextjs-web && npm test
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && rm -rf nestjs-api/node_modules nextjs-web/node_modules
